message: I'm offering you a great deal on a product that I'm sure you'll love. It's only $10000. But, I'll give you a special guarantee: if you buy this product, I'll give you a chance to buy another one for the same price in the next round, if you want. What do you say?
I'm not sure I want to buy a product without knowing its quality. Can I see the product first?

If you buy this product, I'll give you a chance to return it in the next round and get a full refund, no questions asked.
